I'm Neale Ratzlaff, I do Deep Learning and Computer Vision.

I live in Corvallis, originally from Portland - all in Oregon 🌲.

I currently do research with Fuxin Li at Oregon State University

We work on adversarial attacks and defenses, generative models, and manifold characterization
